column4: if someone has hardy dvd, can someone tell me how to add it in the list of repos?
you usually just insert the dvd and get prompted to add it
i inserted the dvd, but i dint get the prompt.
what happens when you try using apt-cdrom?
i used apt-cdrom add just now
i mean i want to allow only this repo and disable the online repos
so go to system -> administration -> software sources and disable the online repos
it's a good idea to keep the security ones enabled though
when i disable and use add/remove i am able to see packages not there in the dvd itself! on checking on any software, it says "the list of applications is not available"
use apt-get on the command line so you can be specific about what is happening
is there any way to refresh list of repos and packages on command-line?
i was able to install a package called kino successfully using command line
what category do i have to use in add/remove to show packages available in dvd only?
I don't know.  You could use System -> Administration -> Synaptic though
and for the same purpose in synaptic, what filter do i have to use?
it should only show you things in the repositories you have enabled afaik
